T02TD2228E:99b-1: aa rtsinta kra ma au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02TD2228E:99b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngan ces bya ba /
T02TD2228E:99b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2228E:99b-5: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2228E:99b-6: shes rab mchog gi mngal nas byung //
T02TD2228E:99b-7: gdod nas gnyis med gnas pa la //
T02TD2228E:99b-8: phyag 'tshal bzang po'i zhal snga yi //
T02TD2228E:99b-9: yang dag rim 'ong bri bar bya //
T02TD2228E:99b-10: thabs dang shes rab gsang ba che //
T02TD2228E:99b-11: snying rje bsam mi khyab mtshan nyid //
T02TD2228E:99b-12: ngag gi spyod yul bsam las 'das //
T02TD2228E:99b-14: rang bzhin bde ba'i 'byung gnas nyid //
T02TD2228E:100a-0: rang byung gnyis su med pa'i mchog / de ni dngos @100a * //
T02TD2228E:100a-2: bltas te bsgom pa dmigs su med //
T02TD2228E:100a-3: byang sems rdo rje can bcas pas //
T02TD2228E:100a-4: dngos po med pas gzigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:100a-5: rtag dang chad pa'i bye brag dag / don dam du ni gnyis med gzigs //
T02TD2228E:100a-6: dngos bo dang ni stong pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:100a-7: gnyis su med par mnyam par bsgom //
T02TD2228E:100a-8: gnyis po 'di dag yod min pas //
T02TD2228E:100a-9: rnam pa thams cad gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:100a-10: gnyis po dag ni rnam dpyad na //
T02TD2228E:100a-12: mnyam pa ro mnyam rnam pa ste //
T02TD2228E:100a-13: bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes mchog / rtog dang brtag pa'i sbyor ba yis ;
T02TD2228E:100a-14: / gnyis med mchog ni bsgom pa min //
T02TD2228E:100a-15: bde ba'i rdo rje mi rtog pa //
T02TD2228E:100a-16: bsam gyis mi khyab kyis thob 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:100a-17: bskyed pa rnam par rtog pa'i rgyur //
T02TD2228E:100a-18: mi skye ba yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2228E:100a-19: gnyis kyi rnam pa dang bral bas //
T02TD2228E:100a-20: bag chags bag chags ldan par spangs //
T02TD2228E:100a-21: ye shes bag chags dang bral bas //
T02TD2228E:100a-22: bzang po'i zhabs kyi rim gyis 'ong //
T02TD2228E:100a-23: rang byung khrem gnyer med pa ni //
T02TD2228E:100a-24: rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02TD2228E:100a-25: dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2228E:100a-26: gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid //
T02TD2228E:100a-27: mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2228E:100a-28: bsam mi khyab pa nyid kyis dpyod ;
T02TD2228E:100a-29: / rtog pa'i dri ma 'dra ba yis //
T02TD2228E:100a-30: rin chen sems ni dri can byas //
T02TD2228E:100a-31: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02TD2228E:100a-32: dri ma bral phyir sangs rgyas brjod //
T02TD2228E:100a-33: thams cad rtog med bdag nyid du //
T02TD2228E:100a-34: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu blta //
T02TD2228E:100a-36: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan //
T02TD2228E:100a-37: rang gi rang bzhin ma skyes la //
T02TD2228E:100a-38: 'jig pa nyid ni yod ma yin //
T02TD2228E:100a-39: ye shes de ni gnyis med min //
T02TD2228E:100a-40: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2228E:100a-41: dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can //
T02TD2228E:100a-42: mi rtog don skyed byed pa po //
T02TD2228E:100a-43: phyi rol nang gi rnam rtog gis //
T02TD2228E:100a-44: 'jig rten thams cad yang dag bstan //
T02TD2228E:100a-45: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis //
T02TD2228E:100a-46: rtog pa phyi rol nyid du bstan //
T02TD2228E:100a-47: gnyis med gnyis las rnam grol ba //
T02TD2228E:100a-48: ye shes rang nyid skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:100a-49: dngos po med par bsgom pa min //
T02TD2228E:100a-50: dngos por yang ni bsgom pa min //
T02TD2228E:100a-51: 'jig pa med pa'i bde bsams na//
T02TD2228E:100b-0: @100b bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med gnas //
T02TD2228E:100b-1: sems can kun gyi bsam pa gang //
T02TD2228E:100b-2: shes rab mngal na rnam par gnas //
T02TD2228E:100b-3: snying rje sad pa'i mda' yis ni //
T02TD2228E:100b-5: dogs pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD2228E:100b-6: gnyis su med cing mchog tu zhi //
T02TD2228E:100b-7: mkha' mnyam rnam rtog las grol ba //
T02TD2228E:100b-8: de nyid gnyis su med par brjod //
T02TD2228E:100b-9: bsam gyis mi khyab rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2228E:100b-10: dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2228E:100b-11: chos kyi zhal snga'i rim 'ong ni //
T02TD2228E:100b-12: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2228E:100b-13: rnam pa'i dbye ba gnyis med la //
T02TD2228E:100b-14: dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che //
T02TD2228E:100b-15: gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2228E:100b-16: 'gro ba rnams ni rnam par sprul //
T02TD2228E:100b-17: stong pa dmigs pa smra ba yis //
T02TD2228E:100b-18: brdzun du smra bas bslus pa rnams //
T02TD2228E:100b-19: rnam rtog rmongs pa'i 'ching ba yis //
T02TD2228E:100b-20: bde ba dam pa gnyis mi rtogs //
T02TD2228E:100b-21: thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las //
T02TD2228E:100b-22: phyi rol rtog pa ngan pa'i rtags //
T02TD2228E:100b-23: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che //
T02TD2228E:100b-24: bde ba chen po gcig nyid du //
T02TD2228E:100b-25: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos po kun //
T02TD2228E:100b-26: gnyis su med pa'i rnam par gnas //
T02TD2228E:100b-27: de rnams rang bzhin rnam dag cing //
T02TD2228E:100b-28: mkha' ltar dri med gnyis med la //
T02TD2228E:100b-29: nga rgyal gyis ni tha snyad brtags//
T02TD2228E:100b-30: tha snyad de yang yod ma yin //
T02TD2228E:100b-31: tshor dang tshor po mtshon bya bral //
T02TD2228E:100b-32: gnyis med bde ba chen po nyid //
T02TD2228E:100b-33: gang yang bsam med rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD2228E:100b-34: sangs rgyas blo yi spyod yul min //
T02TD2228E:100b-35: thams cad de yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD2228E:100b-36: rang byung bsam pa rnams las 'das //
T02TD2228E:100b-37: sa steng srog chags / thams cad ni //
T02TD2228E:100b-38: rtog pa'i dra bas nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:100b-39: ye shes gcig pu gnyis med pa //
T02TD2228E:100b-40: rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD2228E:100b-41: rtag dang chad pa ji snyed pa'i //
T02TD2228E:100b-42: phung po gnyis ni yod min pas /
T02TD2228E:100b-43: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa'i //
T02TD2228E:100b-44: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /
T02TD2228E:100b-45: gnyis dang gnyis med rnam rtog ste //
T02TD2228E:100b-46: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor che //
T02TD2228E:100b-47: ro gcig gnyis su med par brjod //
T02TD2228E:100b-49: dub mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
T02TD2228E:100b-50: rang rig pa yi bde ba nyid //
T02TD2228E:100b-51: de nyid gnyis su med par brjod //
T02TD2228E:101a-0: @101a * // mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid rnam par grol //
T02TD2228E:101a-1: rig pa po dang rig bya spangs //
T02TD2228E:101a-2: bdag med so sor rtog pa yis //
T02TD2228E:101a-3: rin chen sems ni rab rtogs byas //
T02TD2228E:101a-4: dngos po rang bzhin med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2228E:101a-5: dngos med nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101a-6: dbang po'i shes pas rtogs pa yis ;
T02TD2228E:101a-7: / gnyis med ye shes ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2228E:101a-8: spros pa thams cad rnam bral zhing //
T02TD2228E:101a-9: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
T02TD2228E:101a-10: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam gcod cing //
T02TD2228E:101a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med mchog / gnyis med bcud kyis phug pas na //
T02TD2228E:101a-12: rdo dang shing yang de yi dngos //
T02TD2228E:101a-13: lha yi rnam par 'gyur ba ni //
T02TD2228E:101a-14: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2228E:101a-15: thabs dang shes rab snying rje che //
T02TD2228E:101a-16: gcig tu ro gcig rnam pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:101a-17: der ni ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101a-18: gnyis med bde ba chen po nyid //
T02TD2228E:101a-19: gzugs dang sgra dang ro las 'das //
T02TD2228E:101a-20: dri dang reg bya la sogs spangs //
T02TD2228E:101a-21: chos dbyings rang bzhin rnam par dge //
T02TD2228E:101a-22: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog / dogs pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD2228E:101a-23: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD2228E:101a-24: rang bzhin rnam dag ma gos pa //
T02TD2228E:101a-25: gnyis med don ni dam pa'o //
T02TD2228E:101a-26: ma skyes pa dang mi 'jigs pa //
T02TD2228E:101a-27: mi 'gyur ba dang mi gnas pa //
T02TD2228E:101a-28: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /'di ni phyag rgya chen po nyid //
T02TD2228E:101a-29: yon tan rnams dang skyon rnams ni //
T02TD2228E:101a-30: sems kyi rnam par brjod pa ste //
T02TD2228E:101a-31: de la dmigs pa ye shes mchog / khrem gnyer med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2228E:101a-32: ye shes rang las skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101a-33: cung zad kyang ni bsgom pa med //
T02TD2228E:101a-34: gang phyir bsam med chos 'di nyid //
T02TD2228E:101a-35: gnyis med sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas //
T02TD2228E:101a-36: shin tu dri med ches dag cing //
T02TD2228E:101a-37: sgom pa po dang bsgom bya spangs //
T02TD2228E:101a-38: dpal ldan bde ba'i 'byung gnas kun //
T02TD2228E:101a-39: rnam rtog med pas nges mthong 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101a-40: lha yi gzugs ni du ma dang //
T02TD2228E:101a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sku //
T02TD2228E:101a-42: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan thams cad dang //
T02TD2228E:101a-44: khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad dang //
T02TD2228E:101a-45: de bzhin rig pa'i lha mo nyid //
T02TD2228E:101b-0: snang @101b pa'i rnam pa dri med nyid //
T02TD2228E:101b-1: de bzhin mdo sde'i sde snod dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-2: gzhan yang pha rol phyin rim dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-3: sngags dang phyag rgya rig pa dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-4: de bzhin snying nyid bskul ba dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-5: sngags kyi smra ba ma lus pa //
T02TD2228E:101b-6: dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-7: bzlas dang mchod pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02TD2228E:101b-8: gnyis med las ni rang nyid skyes //
T02TD2228E:101b-9: zhi ba nyi ma lta ba dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-11: rig byed tshad mar smra ba dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-12: gzhan yang rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101b-13: kun mkhyen gnas kyi sbyor ba 'di //
T02TD2228E:101b-14: bsam gyis mi khyab mi rtog pa //
T02TD2228E:101b-15: kun du bzang po zhes bya'i lha //
T02TD2228E:101b-16: yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung //
T02TD2228E:101b-17: sa 'og ral gri ril bu dang //
T02TD2228E:101b-18: shing lha bum pa gnod sbyin mo //
T02TD2228E:101b-19: bcud dang mig sman bzang po yang //
T02TD2228E:101b-20: rang nyid 'grub ste gzhan du min //
T02TD2228E:101b-21: sngags pas dngos po bsgom bya min //
T02TD2228E:101b-22: dngos med nyid kyang bsgoms bya min //
T02TD2228E:101b-23: rnam par mi rtog mos pa yis //
T02TD2228E:101b-24: thams cad rang nyid skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:101b-26: zhi ba khyab 'jug sogs ci smos //
T02TD2228E:101b-27: de la tha snyad yod ma yin //
T02TD2228E:101b-28: gzugs dang kha dog mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2228E:101b-29: sgyu ma'i rnam 'dzin bzang mo nyid //
T02TD2228E:101b-30: dang po'i rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD2228E:101b-31: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag ste //
T02TD2228E:101b-32: rtag tu dga' bde'i 'byung gnas nyid //
T02TD2228E:101b-33: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang bral //
T02TD2228E:101b-35: mchog dga'i bde ba rnam pa ste //
T02TD2228E:101b-37: yi ge dang ni ming brjod pa//
T02TD2228E:101b-38: sbyor ba'i tshig tu rab tu bstan //
T02TD2228E:101b-39: gzhan du ngag gi lam 'das phyir //
T02TD2228E:101b-40: smra ba nyid de mi nus so //
T02TD2228E:101b-41: bya ba'i tshul la zhugs pa yin //
T02TD2228E:101b-42: 'dod pa'i don la rol ba yi //
T02TD2228E:101b-43: mchod pa mchog gi dus su ni //
T02TD2228E:101b-44: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan //
T02TD2228E:101b-45: shes rab gnyis su med pas ni ;
T02TD2228E:101b-46: / gcig pu'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2228E:101b-47: bag chags zad par gyur pas na //
T02TD2228E:101b-48: sangs rgyas nyid ni nges par 'thob //
T02TD2228E:101b-49: sna tshogs rigs kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD2228E:101b-50: lta ba sna tshogs sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:101b-51: bag chags dri ma bsags pas ni //
T02TD2228E:101b-52: gnyis med nyid ni rtogs pa min//
T02TD2228E:102a-0: @102a * // thog mtha' dbus dang mtha' ma bral //
T02TD2228E:102a-1: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs //
T02TD2228E:102a-2: bsam dang sems pa dang bral ba //
T02TD2228E:102a-3: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog / gnyis med ces bya sangs rgyas su //
T02TD2228E:102a-4: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2228E:102a-5: de phyir sangs rgyas rtogs pa las //
T02TD2228E:102a-6: sgrub po dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:102a-7: tshig gi sbyor ba bstan pas na //
T02TD2228E:102a-8: sangs rgyas dang ni gnyis med brtags //
T02TD2228E:102a-9: don dam tha dad med tshul gyis //
T02TD2228E:102a-10: gnyis med sangs rgyas gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:102a-11: bstan pa'i ye shes 'char bas na //
T02TD2228E:102a-12: rtogs ba'i rtog pa ring spangs te //
T02TD2228E:102a-13: dngos po la sogs rtog pa kun //
T02TD2228E:102a-14: de nyid las ni lkog tu gyur //
T02TD2228E:102a-15: bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2228E:102a-16: nyams pa gso ba'i sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:102a-17: gnyis med ming du gzung ba la //
T02TD2228E:102a-18: bdag ma 'byor pa bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2228E:102a-19: mkhas pas rab tu 'bad pas kyang //
T02TD2228E:102a-20: bag chags rnams ni zad par byas //
T02TD2228E:102a-21: gzhan du bskal pa grangs med du //
T02TD2228E:102a-22: bye ba sangs rgyas nyid ma yin //
T02TD2228E:102a-23: ye shes gnyis med mgon pos ni //
T02TD2228E:102a-24: bag chags rnams ni zad par byed //
T02TD2228E:102a-25: bag chags zad par gyur pa na //
T02TD2228E:102a-26: gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas brjod //
T02TD2228E:102a-27: bag chags bral ba'i gnas skabs na //
T02TD2228E:102a-28: skyes bu tha ma 'bring po dag / gang gi phyogs ni yod min pas //
T02TD2228E:102a-29: de ni sangs rgyas brjod par bya //
T02TD2228E:102a-30: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2228E:102a-31: shes rab cha ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD2228E:102a-32: thabs ni dngos po bskyed pa po //
T02TD2228E:102a-33: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan //
T02TD2228E:102a-34: de dag 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2228E:102a-35: ro gcig rnam par sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:102a-36: 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i mchog / bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2228E:102a-37: bsam dang sgom pa por bstan med //
T02TD2228E:102a-38: mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma //
T02TD2228E:102a-39: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2228E:102a-40: bzang pos bzang po gsungs pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:102a-41: dpe ni chos rnams thams cad la //
T02TD2228E:102a-42: bzhag pa nyid du de mi nus //
T02TD2228E:102a-43: mig sogs yid kyi rnam shes kyi //
T02TD2228E:102a-44: dpe yi dngos po rnam par spangs //
T02TD2228E:102a-45: gcig nyid thog ma med pa dang //
T02TD2228E:102a-46: mtha' med rnam par yang dag gnas //
T02TD2228E:102a-47: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las /
T02TD2228E:102b-0: @102b mchog gcig gis ni shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:102b-1: rnal 'byor skyes bur bshad pa ste //
T02TD2228E:102b-2: rjes su rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog / gnyis 'das shin tu rnal 'byor te //
T02TD2228E:102b-3: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che //
T02TD2228E:102b-5: nyi zla gza' yis zin pa na //
T02TD2228E:102b-6: shes rab rdo rje'i sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:102b-7: zhu bas gnyis med ye shes kyis //
T02TD2228E:102b-8: skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2228E:102b-9: don dam dga' ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2228E:102b-10: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD2228E:102b-11: grub pa'i gzugs su the tshom med //
T02TD2228E:102b-12: snying rje gnyis su med pa'i mchog / gzugs kyi thog ma 'bring po ni ;
T02TD2228E:102b-13: / gang yang mig gis mthong gyur pa //
T02TD2228E:102b-14: don dam don gyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2228E:102b-15: gnyis med dam par blta bar bya //
T02TD2228E:102b-16: gang yang rna bas thos 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2228E:102b-17: sgra dang sgra ngan rnam phye ba //
T02TD2228E:102b-18: sgra las 'das pa ye shes gtso //
T02TD2228E:102b-19: thos pa gnyis su med pa'i mchog / gang yang lce yis myong 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2228E:102b-20: ro mchog ro ni ngan pa yi //
T02TD2228E:102b-21: ro drug gcig tu gyur pa yi //
T02TD2228E:102b-22: gnyis med mchog ni rtogs par bya //
T02TD2228E:102b-23: sna yis dri ni snam shes pa'i //
T02TD2228E:102b-24: ri dags lte ba la sogs dri //
T02TD2228E:102b-25: gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2228E:102b-26: gnyis med mchog ni shes par bya //
T02TD2228E:102b-27: lus kyi reg bya'i rang bzhin rnams //
T02TD2228E:102b-28: rigs bzang rigs ngan rnam phye ba //
T02TD2228E:102b-29: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2228E:102b-30: snyoms 'jug gnyis su med pa'i mchog / mtha' med thams cad khyab pa po //
T02TD2228E:102b-31: ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer las //
T02TD2228E:102b-32: rang byung mchog tu dga' ba nyid //
T02TD2228E:102b-33: gnyis med sangs rgyas dam pa ste //
T02TD2228E:102b-35: gzugs dang rnam par shes pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:102b-36: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin sku //
T02TD2228E:102b-37: lnga med gnyis su med pa'i bdag / rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen dang //
T02TD2228E:102b-38: tshe dpag med dang don yod bdag / lnga bdag gyur pa'i ril po ni //
T02TD2228E:102b-39: drug pa bde ba chen po nyid //
T02TD2228E:102b-40: sa dang chu dang de bzhin me //
T02TD2228E:102b-41: rlung dang nam mkha'i nyid deng ni //
T02TD2228E:102b-42: 'byung lnga lhan cig skyes pa ni //
T02TD2228E:102b-43: byang chub gnyis su med par 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:102b-44: me long mnyam nyid bya nan tan //
T02TD2228E:102b-45: so sor rtog pa chos dbyings rnams //
T02TD2228E:103a-2: rang byung gcig pu gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:103a-3: sems can bsam ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-4: lta ba la sogs rnam par phye //
T02TD2228E:103a-5: zhi sogs khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang //
T02TD2228E:103a-6: kun mkhyen gcig pu gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:103a-7: mig las byung sogs ma lus dang //
T02TD2228E:103a-8: yid kyi spyod yul las 'das pa //
T02TD2228E:103a-9: don dam gnyis med ces bya ba //
T02TD2228E:103a-10: ngag gi spros pa kun rdzogs kyi //
T02TD2228E:103a-11: gnyis su med la kun du brtags //
T02TD2228E:103a-12: don dam gnas skabs dbyer med pa //
T02TD2228E:103a-13: gnyis su med la sangs rgyas med //
T02TD2228E:103a-14: rtog pas nam mkhar sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-15: ngag gis spros pa bstan pa yin //
T02TD2228E:103a-16: bstan bcos rim pas tshig tu ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-17: rnam par phye ste bshad pa yin //
T02TD2228E:103a-18: gnyis med las gzhan sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-19: smra ba nyid du mi nus so //
T02TD2228E:103a-20: stong pa bcu drug bshad pa dang //
T02TD2228E:103a-21: shes rab bcur ni brtags pa dang //
T02TD2228E:103a-22: sangs rgyas lngar yang bshad pa dang //
T02TD2228E:103a-23: rnam rig dag ni gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:103a-24: me long snang ba'i gzugs brnyan ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-25: ji ltar kun du snang 'gyur ba //
T02TD2228E:103a-26: de bzhin gnyis med ye shes 'dir //
T02TD2228E:103a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2228E:103a-28: khams gsum dag ni thams cad du //
T02TD2228E:103a-29: skye dang gnas pa'i rgyu rnams kyi //
T02TD2228E:103a-30: de kun gnyis med ye shes las ;
T02TD2228E:103a-32: rgya mtsho ri dang shing dang ni //
T02TD2228E:103a-33: rtsa lcug gel ba la sogs pa //
T02TD2228E:103a-34: gnyis med ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD2228E:103a-35: 'di la the tshom yod ma yin //
T02TD2228E:103a-36: pha dang ma yang gcig pa ste //
T02TD2228E:103a-37: 'di la gnyis yod ma yin no //
T02TD2228E:103a-38: gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin las ;
T02TD2228E:103a-39: / gzhan yang thams cad skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:103a-40: 'di ltar thabs dang sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2228E:103a-41: shes rab gnyis med rang bzhin las //
T02TD2228E:103a-43: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'phral du rnyed //
T02TD2228E:103a-44: ye shes dag gi rang bzhin mchog / bla ma brgyud pa rim pa'i gzhung//
T02TD2228E:103a-45: snyan nas snyan dang zhal nas zhal //
T02TD2228E:103a-46: bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2228E:103a-47: bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las //
T02TD2228E:103a-48: bsam med sgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD2228E:103a-50: sangs rgyas nyid ni nges par 'thob //
T02TD2228E:103a-51: rta mchog pa yi zhal snga nas //
T02TD2228E:103b-0: @103b aindra bh'u ti legs smrar bcas //
T02TD2228E:103b-1: sgeg pa'i rdo rje gun di ri //
T02TD2228E:103b-2: slob dpon padma snying rje che //
T02TD2228E:103b-3: chos kyi zhal snga'i rim pa las //
T02TD2228E:103b-4: bzang po'i zhal sngar phrad pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:103b-5: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog / thams cad kyi ni dgongs pa gcig / sngags kyi smra ba ma lus dang //
T02TD2228E:103b-6: de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i lugs //
T02TD2228E:103b-7: mdo sde sde snod la sogs pa //
T02TD2228E:103b-8: 'dir gcig gnyis med bde chen pos //
T02TD2228E:103b-9: mchod 'os zhi ba nyi ma sogs //
T02TD2228E:103b-10: so so'i grub pa'i mtha' nyid dang //
T02TD2228E:103b-11: khyab 'jug dang ni shes bu'i chos //
T02TD2228E:103b-12: gnyis su med par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2228E:103b-13: gnyis med phyi rol yod min pas //
T02TD2228E:103b-14: lha dang lha min tha ma ni //
T02TD2228E:103b-15: thams cad gnyis med ye shes las //
T02TD2228E:103b-16: so sor snang ba gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:103b-17: stong pa'i bye brag tu phye ba //
T02TD2228E:103b-18: snying rje dang ni gnyis med 'dres //
T02TD2228E:103b-19: thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan //
T02TD2228E:103b-20: sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bla ma //
T02TD2228E:103b-21: 'di ni bzang po'i zhal snga'i gzhung //
T02TD2228E:103b-22: ye shes rgya mtsho dam pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:103b-23: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
T02TD2228E:103b-24: dam pa thams cad skye 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2228E:103b-25: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
T02TD2228E:103b-26: gang yang sangs rgyas sogs grags dang //
T02TD2228E:103b-27: nyi zla gza' skar bcas ba yang //
T02TD2228E:103b-28: ye shes rgya mtsho las byung zhing //
T02TD2228E:103b-29: legs smin dang ni dbyangs can nyid //
T02TD2228E:103b-30: ro yi mchog ni myang ba dang //
T02TD2228E:103b-31: tshangs bcas lha min mi rnams ni //
T02TD2228E:103b-32: bdud rtsi las ni thams cad long //
T02TD2228E:103b-33: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dge ba //
T02TD2228E:103b-34: bcu gsum du yang rnam bshad pa //
T02TD2228E:103b-35: gru gsum rnam par 'byung ba ni //
T02TD2228E:103b-37: nyi zla chu yis gang ba yis //
T02TD2228E:103b-38: shes rab gzugs ni cher 'bar ba //
T02TD2228E:103b-39: bde las bde ba chen po kun //
T02TD2228E:103b-40: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob byed ma //
T02TD2228E:103b-41: bad chen 'dab ma bye ba nyid //
T02TD2228E:103b-42: de yi dbus na rnam par gnas //
T02TD2228E:103b-43: rtag tu ge sar bcas pa'i nang //
T02TD2228E:103b-44: a'a li k'a li yang dag ldan ;
T02TD2228E:103b-45: / zla ba nyi ma'i gos kyis bkab //
T02TD2228E:103b-46: shes rab dgu dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2228E:103b-48: thig le zla ba 'char ba'i mchog / dga' ba skyed byed bzang mo ste //
T02TD2228E:103b-49: ma lus don gyi 'bras ster ma //
T02TD2228E:103b-50: dang ba'i bdud rtsi shin tu gang //
T02TD2228E:104a-2: yon tan mtha' yas sa yi gzhi //
T02TD2228E:104a-3: bde dpal rdo rje can gyi gnas //
T02TD2228E:104a-4: thams cad tshim par byed pa mo //
T02TD2228E:104a-5: 'byin byed skyed bar byed ba mo //
T02TD2228E:104a-6: lha yi gzugs ni du ma dag / gnyis med rgya mtsho las ni 'byung //
T02TD2228E:104a-7: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs gzugs dang //
T02TD2228E:104a-8: sprul pa yi ni sku nyid kyis //
T02TD2228E:104a-9: sems can du ma kun gyi don //
T02TD2228E:104a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi //
T02TD2228E:104a-11: mtha' yas mthar thug thams cad du //
T02TD2228E:104a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba po //
T02TD2228E:104a-13: stobs bcu yi ni ye shes ldan //
T02TD2228E:104a-14: shes rab gtso bo dam pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:104a-16: lam mchog bzang po'i rim las 'ongs //
T02TD2228E:104a-17: snying ga lte ba'i padma dang //
T02TD2228E:104a-18: de bzhin lkog ma'i padma nyid //
T02TD2228E:104a-19: dril can skye gnas padma yi //
T02TD2228E:104a-20: dngos su 'dzag pas rnam par gnas //
T02TD2228E:104a-21: bshang gci khu ba 'pho ba dang //
T02TD2228E:104a-22: lta dang snom dang nyan pa dang //
T02TD2228E:104a-23: ro mchog rnams ni rig par 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:104a-24: sgo dgu dag nas rgyu ba yi //
T02TD2228E:104a-25: sa bon pad bsnol rnam pa mtshungs //
T02TD2228E:104a-26: 'og dang steng du rnam par gnas //
T02TD2228E:104a-27: 'di ni shes rab ces bshad pa //
T02TD2228E:104a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi yul nyid do //
T02TD2228E:104a-29: de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha //
T02TD2228E:104a-30: mchog gi dbang phyug gnyis med pa //
T02TD2228E:104a-32: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde chen po //
T02TD2228E:104a-33: me dang chu dang dbang chen dang //
T02TD2228E:104a-34: rlung gis rnam par brgyan pa nyid //
T02TD2228E:104a-35: dal bus 'khor ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2228E:104a-36: bye brag gsum du 'dren par byed //
T02TD2228E:104a-37: dril can bu ga'i lam gyis ni //
T02TD2228E:104a-38: sna yi rtse mor sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:104a-39: srol gong rdo rje'i bu ga ru //
T02TD2228E:104a-40: sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med //
T02TD2228E:104a-41: 'khor bas yongs su nyon mongs na //
T02TD2228E:104a-42: dril can rtse mor ngal so nas //
T02TD2228E:104a-43: rdo rje lce yis rab sbyor bas //
T02TD2228E:104a-44: bdud rtsi btung bar bya ba nyid //
T02TD2228E:104a-45: de nas lus ni rnam dag pa //
T02TD2228E:104a-46: rang bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:104a-47: shes rab bzang zhing yid gzhungs pa //
T02TD2228E:104a-48: rga dang 'chi ba nyams par byas //
T02TD2228E:104a-49: bzang po'i zhal snga'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2228E:104a-50: bdag la rnam par rol par gsungs //
T02TD2228E:104a-51: ting 'dzin bdud rtsi zhes bya ba //
T02TD2228E:104a-52: bde ba'i mchog de bzhin du min //
T02TD2228E:104a-53: sna nas rngub pa'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2228E:104a-54: ham gi rnam pa mi shigs pa //
T02TD2228E:104a-55: dril can bu ga'i lam du ni //
T02TD2228E:104b-0: rtsa rnams @104b sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas //
T02TD2228E:104b-1: so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod //
T02TD2228E:104b-2: cha dang cha min gnyis su med /
T02TD2228E:104b-3: sna yis rngub pa'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2228E:104b-4: ham gi rnam pa mi shigs pa //
T02TD2228E:104b-5: dril can bu ga'i lam gyis ni //
T02TD2228E:104b-6: nges par 'dren pa lam gyi mchog / de la sgo ru ngal so zhing //
T02TD2228E:104b-7: dag pa'i rnam pa 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2228E:104b-8: thog ma med nyid ces bya ba //
T02TD2228E:104b-9: bde dpal rnam par yang dag gnas //
T02TD2228E:104b-10: de nas rlung gis phul ba dang //
T02TD2228E:104b-11: dbang chen yang ni gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:104b-12: nges pa'i lam yang gsal 'gyur ba //
T02TD2228E:104b-13: mchog gi dbang phyug mi shigs pa //
T02TD2228E:104b-14: sa ni bcu gsum dbang phyug mchog / thog ma med par grub pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2228E:104b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas so //
T02TD2228E:104b-16: bzang po'i zhal lnga'i man ngag ste //
T02TD2228E:104b-17: snying po brgyud pa'i rim pa yi //
T02TD2228E:104b-18: gang yang thos pa kun bzung nas //
T02TD2228E:104b-19: de thos bsam pas bsgom pa yin //
T02TD2228E:104b-20: bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2228E:104b-21: nyan ba goms pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02TD2228E:104b-22: dge can tog rtse zhes bya bas //
T02TD2228E:104b-23: gzhung 'di dag ni yang dag bsdus //
T02TD2228E:104b-24: bdag ni bzang po'i zhal snga dang //
T02TD2228E:104b-25: slob dpon gzhan dang rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2228E:104b-26: sems can rnams ni ma lus pa'i //
T02TD2228E:104b-27: bran du skye dang skye gyur cig / bsam pa 'di yi sgo nas ni ;
T02TD2228E:104b-28: / gal te bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD2228E:104b-30: dmyal nyid bde ba can du shog / bsam med gnyis med rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD2228E:104b-31: rim pa'i man ngag mkhyen pa bla //
T02TD2228E:104b-32: lha yi rang bzhin ma lus sngags gzhung rnal 'byor mchog / rnal 'byor rgyas pa mtha' yas bla ma las byung dri med 'di //
T02TD2228E:104b-33: glen pa blo zhan bdag nyid dran pa tsam phyir bris pa yi //
T02TD2228E:104b-34: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i slob dpon tog rtse zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD2228E:104b-35: bde ba'i myu gu dang 'gos kyis bsgyur ba'o /
